events.question: So strange. Where did all of our cattle go?

events.text:
Do me a favour and have a look around?
I imagine the cows haven't gotten far but be careful and don't wander too much!
Maldoror doesn't leave the barn so that gives you a head start, at least.
If you need help with cattle numbers, look for Niki.
You know how much he loves to give names to each of them.
I think Niki might be in the barn with Maldoror.

I can tell from the smell around here you found some of our cattle.
Adequate work, VC. I would go speak to Niki in the barn once you're done.

Here is how I would go about the search:
STEP 1: Carry or throw the cow within barn-distance
This is the fun part: pick up a cow with Left-Click, throw with "F".
STEP 2: Place it somewhere inside the barn Niki and Maldoror are in
Drop the cow with Left-Click again.
